# floaty_client.model.Flight

## Load the model package
```dart
import 'package:floaty_client/api.dart';
```

## Properties
Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**flightId** | **int** | Unique identifier for the flight. Generated by the server. | 
**dateTime** | [**DateTime**](DateTime.md) | Datetime of the flight in UTC (ISO-8601 format with Z suffix) | 
**launchSpotId** | **int** | Reference to the launch spot used for this flight. | 
**landingSpotId** | **int** | Reference to the landing spot used for this flight. | 
**duration** | **int** | Duration in minutes | [optional] 
**description** | **String** | Some textual description of the flight experience. | [optional] 
**gliderId** | **int** | Reference to the glider used for this flight. | 
**igcMetadata** | [**IgcMetadata**](IgcMetadata.md) | Metadata without data, null if no IGC file exists | [optional]
